snippet: Manfrotto, the camera accessories manufacturer, has produced a new iPhone case for the 4 and 4S models that lets you snap on a 12- or 24-LED light array and a tripod.
abstract: Manfrotto, the camera accessories manufacturer, has produced a new iPhone case for the 4 and 4S models that lets you snap on a 12- or 24-LED light array and a tripod.

headline.main: Better iPhone Photos With Klyp and LEDs
headline.print_headline: Photos by iPhone, Upgraded Lighting by LED
